award_labels.label: Companion of the Order of St Michael and St George (CMG)
award_labels.awarding_organization: Order of St Michael and St George
award_labels.reasoning: Significant professional recognition as part of a prestigious British order of chivalry.

award_labels.label: Knight Commander of the Order of St Michael and St George (KCMG)
award_labels.awarding_organization: Order of St Michael and St George
award_labels.reasoning: Higher rank within the Order of St Michael and St George, indicating continued significant professional recognition.

award_labels.label: Knight Grand Cross of the Order of St Michael and St George (GCMG)
award_labels.awarding_organization: Order of St Michael and St George
award_labels.reasoning: Highest rank within the Order of St Michael and St George, marking a major milestone in professional recognition.

award_labels.label: Member of the Order of the Companions of Honour
award_labels.awarding_organization: Order of the Companions of Honour
award_labels.reasoning: Prestigious recognition for outstanding achievements in the arts, sciences, or public service.

award_labels.label: Doctor of Letters (Honorary Degree)
award_labels.reasoning: Honorary degree recognizing significant contributions to literature or academia.
